ol.li: Extends Billable Service
Extends Billable Service
Contains exactly one [1..1] doesPatientAssignBenefits with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] doesProviderAcceptAssignment with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] medicaidTransactionId with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] otherCoverageCode with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] serviceDate with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] submissionClarificationCode with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] transactionId with data type String
Contains zero or one [0..1] billableService, where its type is Procedure
Contains zero or more [0..*] billingSequence, where its type is Billing Sequence
Contains exactly one [1..1] financialArrangement, where its type is Financial Arrangement
Contains zero or one [0..1] placeOfService, where its type is Place Of Service
Contains zero or one [0..1] serviceDeliveryLocation, where its type is Service Delivery Location
Contains zero or more [0..*] workersCompBillableAct, where its type is Workers Comp Billable Event
Contains zero or more [0..*] priorAuthorizationRequest, where its type is Prior Authorization Request
Contains zero or more [0..*] certificateOfMedicalNecessity, where its type is Certificate Of Medical Necessity
Contains zero or one [0..1] eligibilityOverride, where its type is Eligibility Override
Contains zero or more [0..*] patientCaseManagement, where its type is Patient Case Management
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Covered Patient
